BC Reference Model Version 1.0.0
cimi

Element EvaluationComponent

Documentation:
A simplified, non-separable evaluation consisting of a finding code (represented by the Concept), value (or exception value), reference range, and interpretation. The subject of the evaluation component is the same as in the parent evaluation.
Ancestors:
  • EvaluationComponent
Direct Descendants:
  • AverageCEP17SignalsPerCell, 
  • AverageHER2SignalsPerCell, 
  • AverageStainingIntensity, 
  • BreastCancerDistantMetastasesClassification, 
  • BreastCancerPrimaryTumorClassification, 
  • BreastCancerRegionalNodesClassification, 
  • CompleteMembraneStainingPercent, 
  • HER2toCEP17Ratio, 
  • MitoticCountScore, 
  • NuclearPleomorphismScore, 
  • NuclearPositivity, 
  • TubuleFormationScore
Used By:
  • EvaluationResultTopic

      TimePeriod
      0..*
      ExceptionValue
      Reason that a value associated with a test or other finding is missing. CIMI Alignment: This attribute corresponds to EvaluationResultTopic.exceptionValue, but has been moved from topic to context because missing values are only relevant when they should be recorded, but are not. The value set binding extends the set of FHIR's required data absent values, with additional concepts from CIMI.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ExceptionValue
      0..1
      Interpretation
      A clinical interpretation of a finding. CIMI Alignment: The value set binding has been chosen to align with FHIR. (Note: it is not clear if Interpretation belongs in FindingTopic, rather than a context class, but that is how CIMI has modeled it.)
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Interpretation
      0..1
      ReferenceRange
      The usual or acceptable range for a test result.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ReferenceRange
      0..*
